creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension:
40 3/16 x 13 3/4 in. (102 x 35 cm) (image)
71 5/8 x 18 11/16 in. (182 x 47.5 cm) (mount) 53 cm w w/rollers
medium: Hanging scroll (nikuhitsu), ink and color on paper
text: The two girls are kamuro, young attendants of high-class prostitutes. They are trainees and will ultimately become prostitutes themselves, the debut of whom was always an important event in the pleasure quarters. In the back is a kadomatsu, literally “gate pine, ” a traditional New Year’s decoration made of pine, bamboo, and sprigs of flowering plum trees.
title: Courtesan with Two Attendants
